article_title: State creates new position to lead Medicaid expansion in Alaska
article_text: Before Medicaid expansion can happen in Alaska, Ashenbrenner will have to work through a series of hurdles that include the state's Medicaid eligibility and payment systems which have been plagued with defects, as well as talking with legislators who must agree to accept and spend federal funds on expansion as well as allocate state dollars on infrastructure to handle the expanded program.

article_metadata.description: Chris Ashenbrenner, a longtime state employee, has come out of retirement and assumed a newly created position in hopes of helping to guide Alaska through its expected Medicaid expansion process.

og.description: Chris Ashenbrenner, a longtime state employee, has come out of retirement and assumed a newly created position in hopes of helping to guide Alaska through its expected Medicaid expansion process.
